sentences.en: At three hours and 21 minutes, it is an over-long, standard Hollywood epic.

sentences.en: He could as soon write an epic as drive a car.
sentences.cn: 他要是能开汽车就会写叙事诗啦.

sentences.en: Here at Dunkirk is another English epic.
sentences.cn: 在敦刻尔克这个地方,又一次发生英国人可歌可泣的事迹.

sentences.en: I gave up my epic and wrote this little tale instead.
sentences.cn: 我放弃了写叙事诗,而写了这个小故事.

sentences.en: I read the epic work " War and Peace ".

sentences.en: It was during the reign of Queen Isabella that Christopher Columbus set forth on his epic voyage of discovery.

sentences.en: She'll go sailing proudly down the years in the epic of Dunkirk.

sentences.en: The landing on the moon in 1969 was an epic achievement.
